text: mariyu akasalanu mariyu bhumini nijaniki srstincindi ayane! Mariyu a roju ayana: "Ayipo!" Ani anagane, adi ayi potundi. Ayana mate satyam! Mariyu baka (sur) udabade roju, sarvabhaumadhikaram ayanade. Ayane agocara mariyu gocara visayalanni telisinavadu. Mariyu ayana maha vivecanaparudu, sarvam telisina vadu
